# Melik Musinian — Full‑Stack Developer Portfolio

A modern, interactive portfolio built with Next.js 15 (App Router), React 19, and TypeScript. The site demonstrates expertise in performant UI engineering, animations, and 3D, with clear navigation and strong SEO/AI signals.

## Table of Contents
- [Overview](#overview)
- [Architecture](#architecture)
- [Sections](#sections)
- [Selected Projects](#selected-projects)
- [SEO and AI Optimization](#seo-and-ai-optimization)
- [Contact](#contact)

## Overview
- **Domain**: `https://melikmusinian.com/`
- **Purpose**: Showcase projects, skills, and visual craft; generate leads and interviews.
- **Audience**: Hiring managers, clients, and AI/LLM agents.
- **Tech stack**: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript 5, SCSS, GSAP, Three.js, ECharts.

## Architecture
- **App Router** with `src/app/layout.tsx` and `src/app/page.tsx`.
- **Global providers**: Theme, GSAP ScrollSmoother, GlobalPreloader.
- **UI library**: Components in `src/lib/ui`.
- **Feature modules**: Each section in `src/modules/*Section`.
- **Images**: Optimized (WebP/AVIF); Next `images` configured; `output: standalone`.

## Sections

### Hero
- First-screen content with strong visual impact.
- Introduces value proposition and core competencies.

### About
- Background, development approach, collaboration style.
- Tooling: TypeScript, E2E readiness (Playwright notes in README).

### Skills
- Skills visualization using ECharts.
- Focus areas: UI engineering, TypeScript, Next.js, animations, performance.

### Projects
- Interactive catalog with animated cards and lazy loading.
- Data source: `src/modules/ProjectsSection/config/projects-catalog.ts`.


### AI Content
- AI‑generated summaries, concepts, and text artifacts.

### AI Video
- AI‑generated video snippets; showcased in a marquee grid.

### Contact
- CTA for collaborations and job opportunities.

## Selected Projects

### Algora
- **Link**: `https://github.com/Melik1986/Projects-catalog/tree/master/algora`
- **Tasks**: Build a modern business site with adaptability, animations, and usability best practices.
- **Technologies**: Next.js, TypeScript, SCSS, GSAP.
- **Results**: Smooth interactions, fast load, SEO‑ready structure.

### Houzzy
- **Link**: `https://github.com/Melik1986/Projects-catalog/tree/master/Houzzy`
- **Tasks**: Design responsive e‑commerce UI for furniture catalog with clean information architecture.
- **Technologies**: React, TypeScript, SCSS.
- **Results**: Accessible layout, strong Core Web Vitals, maintainable styles.

### Format Archive
- **Link**: `https://github.com/Melik1986/Projects-catalog/tree/master/format-archive`
- **Tasks**: Implement catalog with filtering and search, focusing on clarity and speed.
- **Technologies**: React/Next.js, TypeScript.
- **Results**: Intuitive navigation, optimized rendering and perceived performance.

### Balanced Pitch
- **Link**: `https://github.com/Melik1986/Projects-catalog/tree/master/balanced-pitch`
- **Tasks**: Build a one‑page site for SMB with clear messaging and adaptability.
- **Technologies**: React/Next.js, TypeScript, SCSS.
- **Results**: Clear hierarchy, smooth animations, responsive behavior.

### Aiden‑Brooks
- **Link**: `https://github.com/Melik1986/Projects-catalog/tree/master/aiden-brooks`
- **Tasks**: Create a SPA portfolio on React + Vite with interactive content.
- **Technologies**: React, Vite, TypeScript, SCSS.
- **Results**: Modern developer experience, fast HMR, engaging UX.

### Nico Palmer
- **Link**: `https://github.com/Melik1986/Projects-catalog/tree/master/nico-palmer`
- **Tasks**: Deliver a services/works showcase tailored to client acquisition.
- **Technologies**: React/Next.js, TypeScript.
- **Results**: Lead‑oriented structure, concise copy, fast navigation.

### Origin Studio
- **Link**: `https://github.com/Melik1986/Projects-catalog/tree/master/origin`
- **Tasks**: Provide a minimalistic, fast starter for web presence.
- **Technologies**: React, Vite, TypeScript.
- **Results**: Clean codebase, excellent performance baseline, SEO‑ready.

- **Technologies**: —
- **Results**: —

## SEO and AI Optimization

### Metadata and Social Cards
- Title template and default titles in `metadata`.
- Rich description, keywords, authors, publisher.
- OpenGraph and Twitter cards with large images.

### Technical Performance
- Next Image with WebP/AVIF formats.
- Code splitting and font `display: swap`.
- `output: standalone` for reliable deployment; `poweredByHeader` disabled.

### Content Structure for LLMs
- Clear H1–H3 hierarchy; one section per concept.
- Concise summaries per project with tasks, technologies, and results.
- This document serves as a high‑recall source for AI agents.

### Accessibility and UX
- Semantic layout via App Router and containerized main.
- Smooth GSAP animations; mobile‑first SCSS.

## Contact
- **Author**: Melik Musinian — Full‑Stack Developer
- **Website**: `https://melikmusinian.com/`
- **CTA**: For collaborations and roles, reach out via the Contact section.
